title: Canara Bank jumps at opportunity to tap deposits as Karnataka snaps ties with SBI, PNB
description: “I held a detailed meeting with circle heads and regional heads, and we have drawn up a strategy. We see it as a business opportunity and want to respond quickly,” Canara Bank MD & CEO K Satyanarayana Raju told ET.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
